title: 4 skin ideas
body:
The Rain-Bros (Draven and Darius)
Just a colourful take on the murderous duo complete with rainbow trails on axes and stuff along those lines.

Reverse annie and nunu. (this one probably wont ever happen because of gameplay issues)

Annie riding around tibbers throwing fireballs and eating minions, and a giant firecircle of hell.

Nunu running around freezeing everyone solid with iceballs and blasts, and then summoning willump onto the fields of justice to wreak icy havoc upon his foes.

replies.body: there is a reverse annie...... awkies
they should do reverse reksai and chogath! equally cool

hahah they arent bad at all man, I always have wanted 'Old Timer Zilean'

Grandfather clock strapped to the back of a wheelchair with a blanket across Zilean's lap
